p: CLASH has been a journey for us. While on this journey, we increasingly realized how big the topic of climate and culture evolution is. It was a journey where, at the beginning, we did not make a clear distinction between weather and climate (see Rinderu, Bushman, & van Lange, 2018), we did not make a clear distinction between proximal and ultimate mechanisms (see van Lange et al., 2017b), and we did not fully acknowledge that climate represents a pervasive, stable feature of the natural environment (see van Lange et al., 2017c).
